p: Transcriptomically, our findings broadly agree with those recently reported [ 9, 10]. Our assessment of polyA tail length is in line with both the data reported for SARS-CoV-2 [ 10] and for data on bovine coronavirus [ 61] although the role and significance of this data is unclear in either viral system. One area of difference is in the abundance of each transcript where we disagree with Kim et al. [ 10]; however, our ORF-centric pipeline assessment of individual transcript abundance does broadly agree with Taiaroa et al. [ 9] and the recent report of SARS-CoV-2 mRNA abundance determined by Northern blot [ 48].
